titles.title: HP488 Command thy blessing from above

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Command thy blessing from above,
O God, on all assembled here;
Behold us with a Father's love,
While we look up with filial fear.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
Command thy blessing in this hour,
Spirit of truth, and fill this place
With humbling and exalting power,
With quickening and confirming grace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O thou, our Maker, Saviour, Guide,
One true eternal God confessed:
Whom thou hast joined may none divide,
Nor dare to curse whom thou hast blessed.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
With thee and these for ever bound,
May all who here in prayer unite,
With joyful songs thy throne surround,
Rest in thy love, and reign in light.
